name: Mixed Feelings: While You Were Away
name_original: Mixed Feelings: While You Were Away
description:
Gale and Arthur have been dating since high school, but after graduation, Arthur moved away to go to college. The long-distance relationship was hard on both of them, and Gale found himself feeling lonely without his partner nearby. One day, when he applies to work at a cafe, he meets his charismatic co-worker, Brycen. The two click and soon find themselves attracted to each other. Even though Gale has started to develop feelings for Brycen, he still loves his boyfriend. But deep down, he knows he shouldn't love both.
So, who will Gale end up choosing? His gentle and caring boyfriend, or his playful yet sweet co-worker?

- SFW
- 35K words
- 4 Endings (2 Good & 2 Bad)
- 15 CGs

Credits to Dova Syndrome(https://dova-s.jp/) for Music and Zapsplat(https://www.zapsplat.com/) for Sound Effects.
